content.question: In lines 9-12 (“It meets . . . hand”), the representation of the hands functions primarily as

choices.label: a fleeting moment of pathos in the poem
a controlling image that develops the poem’s theme
an illustration of the tomb’s historical importance
a mysterious detail that eludes the speaker’s notice

content.answer: a controlling image that develops the poem’s theme

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Identify and explain the function of an image or imagery.
